verbose_text: Activated PERK suppresses global protein synthesis and alleviates the ER protein folding load by phosphorylating Ser51 on the alpha subunit of eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2 (eIF2alpha), which impedes translation initiation.
evidence: Activated PERK suppresses global protein synthesis and alleviates the ER protein-folding load by phosphorylating Ser51 on the alpha subunit of eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2
